idea-plugin.name: Open in Cursor
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin adds a convenient menu option to open your IntelliJ IDEA or Android Studio project directly in the Cursor editor. Simply right-click on your project and select "Open In" -> "Cursor" to launch the project in Cursor.

Features:
  • Right-click on any project in the project view
  • Select "Open In" -> "Cursor" from the context menu
  • The project will be opened in Cursor editor automatically
  • Cross-platform support: macOS, Windows, and Linux
  • Automatic detection of Cursor installation

Requirements:
  • Cursor editor must be installed on your system
  • Cursor command-line tool should be available in PATH
